entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3 except temperature steady near zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Periods of freezing drizzle along parts of the coast. Fog patches. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3 except temperature steady near zero along parts of the coast. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 5 except temperature steady near plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Periods of drizzle beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High plus 5 except temperature steady near plus 1 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 24 April 2023
